content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1607696379595{padding-top: 45px !important;}”][vc_column]

About Viceroy Research

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1607696365732{padding-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]We are a group of individuals that see the world differently.

In 2016, Perring was introduced to Bernarde and Lau through a mutual contact who recommended he collaborate with the young Australians. Bernarde took an interest in short selling while earning an accounting degree from the University of Melbourne and teamed up with Lau, a friend who was studying engineering at the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, for research projects. The two quit their day jobs last year to focus on Viceroy full time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2934″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” image_max_width=”250px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
